summary: A petty crook, in search of the clichéd pot of gold at the end of the rainbow, hopes to cash in by befriending the heir to a huge fortune.
cast: Peter O'Toole|Omar Sharif|Christopher Lee|Jude Alderson|Brigitte Barclay|David Boyce|Jane Chaplin|Brian Conway|Carolyn Cortez|Peter Dennis|Joanna Dickens|Berta Domínguez D.|Edward Donovan|Linzi Drew|Ian Dury|Debbie Ferrari|Amanda Jane Forbes|Rachel Garley|Chris Greener|Kay Hamilton|Brian Hibbard|Tom Hibbert|Kirsten Fi-Fi Imrie|Stephen Jenn|Sheila Keith|Andy McEven|Declan Mulholland|Ken Parry|Ian Ricketts|Jean-Yves Tual|Marion Turner|Kate Versey
title: El ladrón del arcoiris
